Translations.Text: And he will talk to human beings (while) in the cradle and (in) old age, and (he will be) from among the righteous
(She) said, "O My Lord ! how can I have a son when man has not touched me?" He said, "Like that, God creates what He wills, when He decrees an affair then, He says to only, "Be," so it is. it is
And He will teach him the book and wisdom and the Torah and the Gospel

and (he will be) a messenger sent to the children of Israel, (saying) that: I have come to you with a sign from your Lord, that I make for you from clay, a figure like that of a bird, then I blow into it, so it becomes a bird by the permission of God; and I heal the blind by birth and the leper and I bring to life the dead by God's permission and I inform you of that which you eat and that which you store in your houses; in that there is certainly a sign for you if you are believers

And I am a testifier for that which is before me of the Torah, and (I have come) to make lawful for you something of that which was forbidden to you and I have come to you with a sign from your Lord so fear God and obey me
God is certainly my Lord and your Lord, so serve Him, this is the straight path

So when Jesus perceived disbelief from them, (he) said, "Who will be my helpers for (the sake of) God." The disciples said, "We are God's helpers, we believe in God and you bear witness that we have submitted (as Muslims)
